bake.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to cook something using dry heat, in an oven
bake.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to make something become hard by heating it
bake.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The bricks were baked in the sun.
bake.translation[0].note_box[0].items[0]: Bake belongs to a group of verbs where the same noun can be the subject of the verb or its object
